name: Finance Outstanding
query: select sales.name as `Invoice No`,sales.`posting_date`,sales.`customer`,sales.`customer_name`,sales.`hypothecation`,sales.`reference`,sales.`grand_total` as `Invoice Amount`,sales.`outstanding_amount`,(select ifnull(sum(debit),0)-ifnull(sum(credit),0) from `tabGL Entry` where `party`=sales.`customer` and `party_type`='Customer') as `Current Customer Balance` from `tabSales Invoice` as sales where sales.`docstatus`=1 and (sales.`hypothecation` is not null and sales.`hypothecation` <> '')
